Hi, I'm Sriram Ramachandrasekaran, from Chennai, India. Apart from writing code to foot my bills, I do it to get some adrenaline going. I started leaning towards code just around the time I graduated and started loving it. I love to observe, apply & validate those observations in my life. I currently ship code at Indix.
